exceptions.tactic: intros n r f m g H H0 H1 H2.
intros n' r f m g H H0 H1 H2.
intros n' r' f m g H H0 H1 H2.
intros n' r' f' m g H H0 H1 H2.
intros n' r' f' m' g H H0 H1 H2.
intros n' r' f' m' g' H H0 H1 H2.

exceptions.exn: In environment r, n : nat f : nat -> nat m : nat g : nat -> nat H : 2 <= r H0 : forall i j : nat, i < j < n -> f i < f j H1 : forall i j : nat, i < j < m -> g i < g j H2 : ∑ n (fun i : nat => power (f i) r) = ∑ m (fun i : nat => power (g i) r) Unable to unify "∑ ?M1528 ?M1529 = msum nat_join 0 ?M1528 ?M1529" with "n = m".
The reference i was not found in the current environment.
The reference j was not found in the current environment.
[Focus] Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.

original: intros n r f m g H H0 H1 H2. split. - apply nat_ortho_sum_join. intro i. induction i. + intros j Hj. specialize (H j). lia. + intros j. apply H0. lia. - intros i Hi. apply power_2_inj. specialize (H2 i). apply H2. lia.
